profileAlternative.headline: Java Champion, Microsoft MVP, TDC Rockstar, Developer, Professor, and Enabler
profileAlternative.summary: Java Champion & Microsoft MVP. Software Craftsman. Empowering developers all around the world with Red Hat tools & expertise to allow better software delivered faster and safely.

aboutAlternative.text: Java Champion & Microsoft MVP. Software Craftsman. Empowering developers all around the world with Red Hat tools & expertise to allow better software delivered faster and safely.

positions.title: Director of Developer Experience
positions.description:
Helping create the vision for Red Hat's tools and technology and inspiring professional software and systems engineers to solve problems. Leading Developer Experience strategies across multiple product teams.

Responsibilities:
• Creating technical content
• Speaking at conferences
• Empowering engineers by delivering hands-on workshops
• Building partnerships with individuals, companies, and organizations
• Connecting with other engineers to identify how Red Hat might help them to be even more successful
• Gathering product feedback that will inform engineering decision-making
• Supporting engineers on forums, social media, meet-ups and other places
…
see more

positions.title: Principal Consultant
positions.description:
Software consultant with a particular taste for difficult projects.
• Helped teams to craft software architectures for highly scalable systems on the cloud
• Implemented and empowered teams with fully automated software deployment pipelines for Continuous Delivery/Continuous Deployment scenarios.

positions.title: Technical Lead
positions.description: Developing new applications targeting large-scale cloud computing environments.

given.text: Edson is an excellent professional and professor! He has great experience at software development and network administration. He is always updated with the latest technologies and prepared to work with any kind of project. One of the best person I've worked with.

Edson é um profissional competente, tem boa visão de negócios, preza pela ética, esta sempre atualizado com as tendências de mercado. Especialista em soluções Web, Java. Como consultor de TI, esteve sempre disponível nos auxiliando no suporte a incidentes em sistemas online de grande demanda e criticidade. Tem colaborado enormemente no fomento e disseminação de conhecimentos na comunidade tecnológica de Maringá e Região.
…
See more

Edson is one of the most brilliant developers I've ever worked with. Never afraid to try new technologies, he's always reading and experimenting upfront to tell you what is worth or not. An active blogger, never leaves a jug question without answer.

I met Edson Yanaga on the first year of my high school degree. He made the difference through the way that teachers normally do in there. Always requesting more than we where expected to give. He demanded us to grow and start researching more. A person with great teaching capabilities and nice humor sense. Of course today when I´m teaching I always use some of his tips.
…
See more

Profissional de primeira grandeza. Competente e responsável. Uma sumidade quando o assunto é JAVA e uma segurança muito grande quando comprometido com um projeto sob a sua responsabilidade. Comprometido com o cliente e com as entregas dos projetos. Recomendo!!!
Edson is a committed IT professional with solid knowledge in java and other technologies. IT is his life and everybody that work with him feel the passion he brings to all the projects that he works.

received.text: I had the pleasure of working with Juliana when I visited Singapore for Voxxed Singapore 2017. She surprised me with her organization and initiative, by doing not only what was asked from her, but by assembling an awesome experience for Red Hat at the event. It's not an overstatement to say that this was probably one of the best organized events I've ever spoke at. I definitely hope to be able to work with her again in other opportunities.

Paulo foi meu colega de graduação, e desde essa época já reconhecia nele uma pessoa séria, dedicada e competente. Infelizmente por esses grupinhos que se formam nas turmas da universidade nunca fomos tão próximos quanto gostaria - um leve arrependimento que sou obrigado a carregar.

Num encontro em Maringá proporcionado pelo acaso conversamos um pouco, e como a turma de pós-graduação em Desenvolvimento Orientado a Objetos em Java do CESUMAR estava desfalcada de um professor de JavaEE não tive dúvida em convidá-lo para ministrar esta disciplina.

Embora tenhamos nos afastado durante muito tempo após a formatura, o feedback proporcionado pelas redes sociais corrobora a reputação de excelente profissional que o Paulo se tornou. Como professor da disciplina de pós-graduação não foi diferente, e o tenho em alta estima também como professor pelo ótimo trabalho desenvolvido como docente. Espero que em outras oportunidades possamos voltar a trabalhar juntos, quem sabe da próxima vez de modo ainda mais próximo.
